title: Lantern AI Career Assessment
description: Career exploration questionnaire for high school students

questions.label: What grade are you currently in, and what's your ZIP code?
Do you know what career you want to pursue?

yes.label: Which of these career categories are you interested in?

other.label: Please specify what trade career interests you:
Please specify what engineering career interests you:

business_management.label: Which business and management career interests you?

other.label: Please specify what business and management career interests you:
Please specify what technology career interests you:
Please specify what educator career interests you:
Please specify what healthcare career interests you:

public_safety.label: Which public safety career interests you?

other.label: Please specify what public safety career interests you:
Please specify what researcher career interests you:
Please specify what artist career interests you:
Please specify what law career interests you:
Please specify what career you're interested in:

options.label: Adventurous and willing to take risks

no.label: What are your interests or hobbies?
What work, volunteer, or hands-on experience do you have?

questions.label: Rate your performance in each subject area:
List any AP, Honors, and elective classes you have taken in each subject area:
questions.description: For each subject, list any advanced or specialized courses you've taken (AP, Honors, electives, etc.). Leave blank if none.
questions.placeholder: e.g., AP Calculus BC, Honors Chemistry, Photography, Robotics

questions.label: How much education are you willing to pursue?

options.label: A few months to 2 years (certifications or training)

questions.label: Are there any factors we should consider when suggesting careers?

options.label: Start earning money as soon as possible
Physical work may be difficult for me

questions.label: Do you feel you have support for education or training after high school?
How do you want to be remembered or make an impact? Who inspires you and why?
questions.placeholder: Share your thoughts about the impact you want to make and who inspires you...

test_profiles.name: D1 Trade Electrician
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to build things that last and help people by making homes safer. I'm inspired by people who can fix anything and stay calm under pressure.

test_profiles.name: D2 Healthcare Registered Nurse
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to be someone families trust in tough moments. I'm inspired by nurses who stay kind and steady even when things are stressful.

test_profiles.name: D3 Engineering Mechanical Engineer
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to design machines that solve real problems and improve everyday life. I'm inspired by engineers who build practical solutions and keep improving them.

test_profiles.name: D4 Artist UX UI Designer
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to design things that feel easy and inclusive for everyone. I'm inspired by creators who make apps and products that are beautiful and simple.

test_profiles.name: D5 Law Paralegal
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help people understand their rights and make fair decisions. I'm inspired by people who speak up and use facts to solve problems.

test_profiles.name: U1 Undecided Hands On Builder
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: I like building LEGO sets, fixing bikes, and watching videos about how engines work.
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Helped my family with small home repairs and took care of tools in a garage.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to be useful and dependable. I'm inspired by people who can fix problems quickly and do quality work.

test_profiles.name: U2 Undecided Helping People
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: I like volunteering, working with kids, and learning about health and the human body.
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Volunteer at a community center and help with tutoring younger students.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to support people when they're struggling. I'm inspired by mentors and healthcare workers who stay calm and kind.

test_profiles.name: U3 Undecided Tech Problem Solver
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: I like coding small projects, solving puzzles, and learning how apps and networks work.
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Built a simple website and helped friends troubleshoot laptops and Wi-Fi.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to build tools that make life easier and safer online. I'm inspired by people who solve hard technical problems.

test_profiles.name: U4 Undecided Creative Communicator
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: I enjoy making videos, designing posters, and talking to people. I like social media and storytelling.
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Managed a club's Instagram and edited videos for school events.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to inspire people and create messages that matter. I'm inspired by creators who build communities and tell great stories.

test_profiles.name: U5 Undecided Public Service Minded
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: I'm interested in government, fairness, and how communities work. I like organizing events and debates.
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Student council and helped run a school fundraiser; volunteered at a local food bank.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help make rules and systems fair. I'm inspired by leaders who improve their communities through service.

test_profiles.name: P1 Business Path Unknown Specific
test_profiles.q3a3_business_other: I know I want a business/management career, but I'm not sure which role fits me best (maybe analytics, management, or finance).
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to build a stable career and lead teams well. I'm inspired by people who create opportunities and run organizations responsibly.

test_profiles.name: P2 Technology Path Unknown Specific
test_profiles.q3a4_technology_other: I want a technology career but I'm not sure whether I should focus on cybersecurity, software, or data.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to build technology that protects people and solves problems. I'm inspired by people who create useful tools and keep learning.

test_profiles.name: P3 Educator Path Unknown Specific
test_profiles.q3a5_educator_other: I know I want to work in education, but I'm not sure if I should teach, counsel, or work in curriculum/administration.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help students feel supported and confident. I'm inspired by teachers and counselors who make school feel safe and meaningful.

test_profiles.name: P4 Public Safety Path Unknown Specific
test_profiles.q3a7_public_safety_other: I want a public safety career, but I'm not sure whether EMT, firefighter, or law enforcement fits me best.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to protect people and be helpful in emergencies. I'm inspired by first responders who stay brave and calm.

test_profiles.name: P5 Other Path Unknown Specific
test_profiles.q3a11_other_career: I know I want a career in sports and fitness or athletic performance, but I'm not sure what job that would be.
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help people improve their health and performance. I'm inspired by coaches and trainers who motivate others to reach goals.

test_profiles.name: S01
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Building things with my hands, fixing electronics, working on cars
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Helped repair family car, built furniture for my room, volunteer at local maker space
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to create things that solve real problems and last a long time. I'm inspired by engineers and craftspeople who build the infrastructure we rely on.

test_profiles.name: S02
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Solving complex problems, coding, mathematics, science experiments
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Participated in math competitions, created apps for school projects, tutored younger students in math
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to push the boundaries of what's possible through research and innovation. I'm inspired by scientists and researchers who make breakthrough discoveries.

test_profiles.name: S03
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Helping others, understanding human behavior, community service, psychology
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Volunteer at local hospital, peer counseling program, organized charity drives
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help people overcome challenges and reach their potential. I'm inspired by counselors, therapists, and social workers who make a difference in people's lives.

test_profiles.name: S04
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Art, design, music, theater, creative writing, social media
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Lead role in school play, designed posters for school events, manage social media for local nonprofit
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to create art and content that inspires and connects people. I'm inspired by artists, designers, and creators who use their talents to tell important stories.

test_profiles.name: S05
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Business, entrepreneurship, organizing events, economics, debate
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Started small business selling handmade items, treasurer of student council, organized school fundraiser
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to build successful businesses that create jobs and solve problems. I'm inspired by entrepreneurs who build companies that make a positive impact.

test_profiles.name: B01
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Working with animals, outdoor activities, farming, environmental conservation
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Worked on family farm during summers, volunteer at animal shelter, 4-H club member
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to work with nature and animals to help feed people and protect the environment. I'm inspired by farmers and veterinarians who care for living things.

test_profiles.name: B02
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Reading, research, libraries, history, writing, academic subjects
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Library volunteer, research assistant for history teacher, editor of school newspaper

q4b_course_history.Social Studies / History: AP World History, AP U.S. History

test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to preserve knowledge and help others learn and discover new things. I'm inspired by librarians, researchers, and educators who make information accessible.

test_profiles.name: B03
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Travel, different cultures, languages, outdoor adventures, photography
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Family travels internationally, exchange student program, outdoor leadership camp
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to connect different cultures and help people understand each other. I'm inspired by diplomats, translators, and travel professionals who bridge cultural gaps.

test_profiles.name: B04
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Community service, social justice, helping disadvantaged populations, organizing events
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Volunteer at homeless shelter, organized school food drive, member of social justice club
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to fight for fairness and help people who don't have a voice. I'm inspired by social workers, activists, and community leaders who create positive change.

test_profiles.name: B05
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Numbers, patterns, organization, financial planning, budgeting
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Helped family with tax preparation, treasurer of school club, part-time job at local business
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help people and businesses manage their money wisely. I'm inspired by accountants and financial advisors who help others achieve financial security.

test_profiles.name: R01
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Community organizing, cultural events, mentoring younger students, public speaking
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Youth leadership program, organized cultural celebration at school, mentor in after-school program

q4b_course_history.Social Studies / History: African American Studies, AP U.S. Government

test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to be a voice for my community and create opportunities for others who look like me. I'm inspired by civil rights leaders and community organizers who fight for justice.

test_profiles.name: R02
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Traditional arts and crafts, storytelling, preserving cultural heritage, working with elders
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Learned traditional crafts from grandmother, volunteer at cultural center, translate for community members
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to preserve my culture and help my community maintain its traditions while adapting to the modern world. I'm inspired by elders and cultural preservationists.

test_profiles.name: R03
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Science, medicine, helping underserved communities, research, health disparities
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Volunteer at community health clinic, science fair participant, tutor younger students in STEM
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to become a doctor or researcher to help address health disparities in communities like mine. I'm inspired by healthcare professionals who serve underrepresented populations.

test_profiles.name: R04
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Mechanics, electronics, building things, problem-solving, working with tools
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Help family with car repairs, built computer from parts, work part-time at auto shop
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to have skills that are always in demand and be able to fix things that matter to people. I'm inspired by skilled tradespeople who take pride in their craft.

test_profiles.name: R05
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Working with children, education, community development, cultural bridge-building
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Tutor ESL students, volunteer at community center, organize cultural exchange events

q4b_course_history.English / Language Arts: AP English Language, ESL Teaching Assistant

test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help immigrant families and students succeed in school and life. I'm inspired by teachers and social workers who help people navigate new cultures.

test_profiles.name: U01
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Fashion, social media, networking, event planning, urban culture
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Intern at local fashion boutique, manage social media for school events, organize community block parties
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to create trends and help people express themselves through style and culture. I'm inspired by fashion designers and influencers who shape urban culture.

test_profiles.name: U02
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Urban planning, architecture, public transportation, city development, sustainability
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Intern at city planning office, participate in youth city council, research urban sustainability projects
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to make cities more livable and sustainable for everyone. I'm inspired by urban planners and architects who design spaces that bring communities together.

test_profiles.name: U03
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Music production, entertainment industry, digital content creation, performing arts
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Produce music for local artists, create content for YouTube channel, perform at open mic nights
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to create music and content that moves people and reflects urban experiences. I'm inspired by producers and artists who use their platform to tell authentic stories.

test_profiles.name: U04
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Community health, social work, helping at-risk youth, mental health awareness
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Volunteer at community center, peer mediator program, organize mental health awareness events
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help young people in my community overcome challenges and build better futures. I'm inspired by social workers and counselors who never give up on people.

test_profiles.name: U05
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Technology repair, cybersecurity, computer networks, digital forensics
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Repair computers for neighbors, participate in cybersecurity competitions, volunteer IT support at community center
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to protect people and businesses from cyber threats and help them use technology safely. I'm inspired by cybersecurity experts who stay ahead of digital criminals.

test_profiles.name: RU01
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Agriculture, machinery, land management, outdoor work, sustainable farming
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Work on family ranch, operate farm equipment, participate in FFA, help with livestock
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to continue the family tradition of farming while using new technology to be more sustainable. I'm inspired by farmers who adapt to change while caring for the land.

test_profiles.name: RU02
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Healthcare, helping elderly, nursing, emergency medical services, community health
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Volunteer at local clinic, help care for grandparents, first aid certified, volunteer firefighter
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to provide healthcare to people in rural areas who don't have easy access to medical services. I'm inspired by rural nurses and EMTs who serve their communities.

test_profiles.name: RU03
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Outdoor recreation, wildlife, forestry, conservation, hunting and fishing guides
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Work as hunting guide assistant, volunteer for wildlife conservation projects, outdoor leadership camp
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to protect wildlife and help people appreciate nature through outdoor experiences. I'm inspired by park rangers and guides who share their love of the outdoors.

test_profiles.name: RU04
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Energy, engineering, renewable resources, problem-solving, mechanics
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Help maintain wind turbines with family member, participate in science fair, build renewable energy projects
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to develop clean energy solutions that can help rural communities become more sustainable. I'm inspired by engineers who solve energy challenges.

test_profiles.name: RU05
test_profiles.q8_interests_text: Education, community development, local government, preserving rural traditions
test_profiles.q9_experience_text: Tutor younger students, participate in youth leadership program, volunteer for local government projects
test_profiles.q19_20_impact_inspiration: I want to help rural communities thrive and preserve what makes them special while adapting to modern challenges. I'm inspired by local leaders who serve their communities.
